TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1030
TEI.2.document_title: James Grant to Stephen F. Austin, 01-31-1825

barker_notes.barker_summary: James Grant to Austin, January 31, 1825. Land.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1030

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*James Grant to Austin, January 31, 1825. Land.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Camargo*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="01-31-1825">31st Jany. 1825*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Colnl Austin*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear Sir, I take the opportunity of *person_mentioned*Colnl Milam, */person_mentioned*passing your way, to drop you a few lines respecting my interest in your *location_mentioned*Colony,*/location_mentioned* I have been a great deal absent, but it has been completely out of my power to be there, my business in this part of the *location_mentioned*Country*/location_mentioned* has been in such a situation that I have not been able to leave, I am now doing my best to wind up, and I will be able to do so about *date_mentioned n="06-xx-1825">June*/date_mentioned* when I will be on with you; I have to appeal to your goodness to protect my interest with you, untill I arrive my absence has not been with my will, but from the circumstance above stated; which I know your knowledge with the mode of doing business in this part of the *location_mentioned*Country*/location_mentioned* will fully satisfy you in the cause. I have property plenty in the *location_mentioned*Colony*/location_mentioned* to pay for my land and have directed *person_mentioned*Captn Jones*/person_mentioned* to do so; by your granting me this request you will confer an obligation on Dr Sir your Respectfully*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*James Grant*/person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*/div1*
